title: Biomarkers in the Evaluation of Chronic Lung Disease

operands.value: Subject is at least 18 years of age
Subject has confirmed Interstitial Lung Disease
Subject is able to complete study procedures, such as spirometry
Subject is able to complete Pulmonary Exercise test
Must have a minimum age of 18 Years
Subject is unable to perform tasks associated with study

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must have a minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Subject has confirmed Interstitial Lung Disease'), Symbol('Subject has confirmed Pulmonary Hypertension'), Symbol('Subject is able to complete Pulmonary Exercise test'), Symbol('Subject is able to complete study procedures, such as spirometry'), Symbol('Subject is at least 18 years of age'), Not(Or(Symbol('Subject is pregnant'), Symbol('Subject is unable to perform tasks associated with study'))))
